ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters Spell Components
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheh, just because you haven t seen them, doesn t mean they aren t there ;) Yes, there are a couple of named Orcs in Kithicor Forest ;) Talarin, High Elven
ygData.messageBody:
Heheh, just because you haven't seen them, doesn't mean they aren't there ;)
Yes, there are a couple of named Orcs in Kithicor Forest ;)

Talarin, High Elven Wizard


----- Original Message -----
From: Valacian <abryson@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 1:45 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Enchanters Spell Components


> Named Orc in Kithicor? You probably mean Highhold Pass.:) I haven't ever
seen a named orc in Kithicor.
>
> Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Shadowwalker [SMTP:Shadowwalker@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 11:44 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Enchanters Spell Components
>

>
> -Shadowwalker
>
